com.att.aro.model

Class BatteryInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.aro.model.BatteryInfo

  • public class BatteryInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains battery information for a device, and provides methods for retrieving the level, temperature, and state of the battery.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BatteryInfo(double bTimestamp, boolean bState, int bLevel, int bTemp)
      Initializes an instance of the BatteryInfo class, using the specified time stamp, battery state, level and temperature.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBatteryLevel()
      Returns the battery level.
      int getBatteryTemp()
      Returns the temperature of the battery.
      double getBatteryTimeStamp()
      Return the time stamp of when the battery information was last modified.
      boolean isBatteryState()
      Returns the on/off state of the battery.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BatteryInfo

        public BatteryInfo(double bTimestamp,
           boolean bState,
           int bLevel,
           int bTemp)
        Initializes an instance of the BatteryInfo class, using the specified time stamp, battery state, level and temperature.
        Parameters:
        bTimestamp - The time at which the battery information was modified.
        bState - The on/off state of the battery.
        bLevel - The battery level.
        bTemp - The battery temperature.

    • Method Detail

      • getBatteryTimeStamp

        public double getBatteryTimeStamp()
        Return the time stamp of when the battery information was last modified.
        Returns:
        A double that is the time stamp of when the battery information was last modified.

      • isBatteryState

        public boolean isBatteryState()
        Returns the on/off state of the battery.
        Returns:
        A boolean value that is true if the battery is on, and false if the battery is off.

      • getBatteryLevel

        public int getBatteryLevel()
        Returns the battery level.
        Returns:
        The battery level.

      • getBatteryTemp

        public int getBatteryTemp()
        Returns the temperature of the battery.
        Returns:
        An int that is the battery temperature.
